skins.selfIntroduction: I’m Z23, the eldest sister of the 1936A-class destroyers. Unlike my sisters before me, who all had a namesake, my younger sisters and I only had a serial code for our names. It might be a little cold and impersonal, but I believe it’s also more convenient. So please, feel free to call me Z23.
skins.acquisition: Guten Tag, Commander. I am Z23. Let’s study hard together and aim for the top!
skins.login: There's still quite a lot to be done today. No procrastinating!
skins.details: If you have the time to stare at me, shouldn’t you go back to your studies? Even I... can get embarrassed...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Don’t worry, Commander. The fact that you care about me is enough.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wonder if there’s something I can do for you, Commander. You seem tired lately, so maybe a massage would be good?
skins.secretaryIdle3: See, Commander? You can do it if you set your mind to it!
skins.secretaryIdle4: Huh? What am I in charge of? A-ahaha... I, uh... forgot...
skins.secretaryTouch: If you’re free, why not help with some paperwork?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: This isn’t something a commander should be doing...
skins.secretaryHeadpat: I’m not the kind of girl who you can fool with just a few headpats. Get back to work, Commander.

skins.shipDescription: My efficiency should be upgraded along with my performance. Paperwork, battle plans... I can handle them all! Commander, be prepared, we’ll be very busy~
skins.acquisition: My efficiency should be upgraded along with my performance. Paperwork, battle plans... I can handle them all! Commander, be prepared, we’ll be very busy~
skins.login: Commander, look alive, let’s make a greater effort on our attacks.
skins.details: Ok, just little bit more and the retrofit will be complete... let’s go find Javelin and play with them―― Hey, *points*, it’s the Commander?! *Cough*, great timing, here are some documents...
skins.secretaryIdle4: Once we complete today’s mission, then come back and confirm our schedule for sorties over the next few days, there are still many things left to do.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, are you prepared to work in a lockdown environment?

skins.JPClientName: ハイラ`テンシュヴァルツ
skins.shipDescription: Whew... Sorry to keep you waiting. I was having a hard time deciding which outfit to wear... Ah, um... how do I look?
skins.acquisition: Whew... Sorry to keep you waiting. I was having a hard time deciding which outfit to wear... Ah, um... how do I look?
skins.login: Commander, did you make sure to eat the meal I made for you? Mmhmm, good, good~
skins.details: Commander, I can't concentrate on my reading if you're staring at me like that! Gosh...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I'll be here reading, so just call my name if something happens. I have to study hard so that I can keep up with you!
skins.secretaryIdle2: You look so cool and hardworking like that... Uh, ahem! Disregard that! A-anyway, would you like a light snack?
skins.secretaryIdle3: How to help the Commander work more efficiently and comfortably... Hmm, it'll be quite the challenge, but well worth it!
skins.secretaryTouch: Yes, yes, I know I look cute in this outfit, so hurry up and get back to work! Jeez, what am I to do with you, Commander...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wait, if you're going to do this kind of stuff, at least save it for after work! Even if I like... I mean, err, d-disregard what I just said!

skins.shipDescription: This is going to be on the exam! If you don't take thorough notes, I am going to punish you!
skins.acquisition: This is going to be on the exam! If you don't take thorough notes, I am going to punish you!
skins.details: Have you memorized this? This part's going to show up on the test. If you don't pass, you'll...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, do you remember the naval intelligence I explained to you earlier? ... I'm asking you a question here...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Afterwards, let's get something to eat. It's on me. Consider it a reward for all your hard work today.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, pain is temporary. Victory is forever.
skins.secretaryTouch: If there's a part you don't understand, speak up and ask.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: P-playing pranks on your instructor is prohibited! *blushes*

skins.shipDescription: Haiyaaah! It's up to you, Ayanami! Oh, Commander! Are you actually keeping score? We might not be having a serious match, but that's no excuse for you to stand around and do nothing.
skins.acquisition: Haiyaaah! It's up to you, Ayanami! Oh, Commander! Are you actually keeping score? We might not be having a serious match, but that's no excuse for you to stand around and do nothing.
skins.login: What a great day for exercise it is today, Commander!
skins.details: Y-you were too enraptured by my swimsuit to keep track of the ball?! Come on, please focus, Commander! Geez...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Javelin's boxed lunches look really good! I should ask her to teach me how to make them like she does!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Laffey? Laffey! Wake up! Good grief, how do you manage to fall asleep while playing volleyball?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Another year, another unforgettable visit to the beach! Right, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Oops! Look out, Commander...! Oh, nice catch. Sorry about that, I bounced the ball at an odd angle...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wh-what do you think you're doing?!

skins.shipDescription: Welcome! A table for one today? Um... Commander, my smile doesn’t look stiff... right?
skins.acquisition: Welcome! A table for one today? Um... Commander, my smile doesn’t look stiff... right?
skins.details: Ugh... how am I supposed to keep smiling all day long? My jaw's gone stiff already...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, it's not polite to stare... oh! Smiling, I'm smiling... *cough cough*! What can I get for you?
skins.secretaryIdle2: So if you order this set, you can choose from one of these, or these. Not a bad deal, eh?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hmm... I should really take this opportunity to learn some new recipes. Oh, sorry, this is your menu~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you can't just chat with me while I'm on duty. I've got work to do.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, if you get in my way again I'll have to ask you to leave!

skins.JPClientName: しきア`ベントクライト
skins.shipDescription: Oh, good evening, Commander. I was just looking for Javelin and the others... Say, would you like to keep me company for a bit?
skins.acquisition: Oh, good evening, Commander. I was just looking for Javelin and the others... Say, would you like to keep me company for a bit?
skins.login: Are you enjoying the party, Commander?
skins.details: I've been smiling a lot more lately? ... Well, that's because you've gotten so much more respectable.
skins.secretaryIdle1: When I see everyone's smiling faces, I can't help but think about all the hard work that got us here. How about you, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: The four of us: Laffey, Javelin, Ayanami, and I... Who would have thought we'd all become such good friends?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Champagne? Oh, heavens no, Commander! This is just sparkling orange juice.
skins.secretaryTouch: D-D-Dance?! ... Oh my, I never thought it might come to this... Commander, can you teach me how to do it...?

skins.shipDescription: Hi, welcome! How may I serve yC It's you, Commander?! Err, well, I'm working as a trainee at this Sakura Empire-style café, you see... What do you think of this outfit?
skins.acquisition: Hi, welcome! How may I serve yC It's you, Commander?! Err, well, I'm working as a trainee at this Sakura Empire-style café, you see... What do you think of this outfit?
skins.login: What would you like to order, Commander?
skins.details: Eugen is going around teasing and feeling up the café employees again... Ugh, it's giving me an upset stomach...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hatsuharu looks extremely nervous... Maybe there's a way to soothe her...
skins.secretaryIdle2: What's up, Yuugure? The kettle? Oh shoot! I totally forgot!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Please try to keep quiet in the store! Why do Yuudachi and her friends always need to cause such a commotion...
skins.secretaryTouch: More tea, you say? Coming right up!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Please, don't try to imitate Eugen's bad behavior!

skins.CNClientName: 正经偶像・经纪人担当？
skins.JPClientName: 真面目アイドル?マネ`ジャ`兼任!?
skins.shipDescription: Jeez... Javelin's got what it takes, but I'm really concerned about Laffey and Ayanami. Oh well, I guess it's up to me to manage them... Commander, please don't forget to support me too.
skins.acquisition: Jeez... Javelin's got what it takes, but I'm really concerned about Laffey and Ayanami. Oh well, I guess it's up to me to manage them... Commander, please don't forget to support me too.
skins.login: If you're going to do something, you've got to do it right! I'm aiming for the top!
skins.details: I don't mind balancing my work as both a manager and as an idol. As a matter of fact, I think I might actually be well suited to it.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I just remembered, Laffey has an audition today... so where is she?! ...Gaaaah!! Sorry, I have something to attend to!
skins.secretaryIdle2: ...Recently, more and more girls have been asking me to become their manager. Jeez, I have my own idol activities to take care of!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I have no objections to your laissez-faire approach towards management, but don't lose sight of our responsibilities.
skins.secretaryIdle4: Commander, I'm heading off to lessons, so don't forget to finish your missions!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, which area should I improve on next?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, please help hold onto the ladder. I've almost got the book... Just a little more... All right... C-Commander?! Please don't look up!
skins.acquisition: Commander, please help hold onto the ladder. I've almost got the book... Just a little more... All right... C-Commander?! Please don't look up!
skins.details: Phew... Nothing calms the mind like enjoying a nice book... Commander, want to join me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Miss Ranger, what book are you looking for? ...Huh? Are you all right? Should I help find it for you?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ah, go ahead and put that book inside that cardboard box. I'll take it over to Shiranui later.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Laffey and Javelin don't seem to read much... Mhm, Ayanami and I will see if we can pick out some books that would be helpful to them.
skins.secretaryTouch: Woaaahhh! Commander, please keep the ladder steady!
